# BitesBuzz Flutter App Development Guide

## Project Overview
BitesBuzz is a beginner-friendly Flutter app for university cafeteria food ordering. It focuses on pixel-perfect design matching Figma mockups with simple navigation and form handling.

## Development Checklist

- [x] Project scaffolding and directory structure created
- [x] pubspec.yaml configured with minimal dependencies
- [x] Basic theme setup in main.dart
- [ ] Create Login Screen
- [ ] Create Home Screen
- [ ] Create Menu Screen
- [ ] Create Item Details Screen
- [ ] Create Cart Screen
- [ ] Create Checkout Screen
- [ ] Create Order Tracking Screen
- [ ] Create Profile Screen
- [ ] Setup navigation routes
- [ ] Add Figma design overlays
- [ ] Test all screen navigation
- [ ] Final pixel-perfect adjustments

## Key Principles
- Keep code simple and beginner-friendly
- Add clear comments throughout
- Use Figma images as design reference
- No complex state management or backend
- Focus on widgets, layout, and forms

## Project Structure
```
lib/
  main.dart              # App entry, theme, routing
  screens/               # All screen files
  widgets/               # Reusable UI components
assets/
  figma/                 # Figma design reference images
```

## Next Steps
1. Add Figma design images to assets/figma/
2. Create the Login Screen
3. Create the Home Screen
4. Continue with remaining screens
